channel.title: World News Headlines, Latest International News, World Breaking News - Times of India
channel.description: World News: TOI brings the latest world news headlines, Current International breaking news world wide. In depth analysis and top news headlines world wide.

image.title: World News Headlines, Latest International News, World Breaking News - Times of India

item.title: Billionaire donors driving 2024 US presidential campaigns: How Trump’s and Harris’ top backers are shaping election
item.description: The article examines the vital role of small and large donors in the presidential campaigns of Kamala Harris and Donald Trump. Highlighting substantial contributions from billionaires like Timothy Mellon and Elon Musk for Trump, and Reid Hoffman, George Soros for Harris, it underscores the significant influence wealthy donors have in modern political campaigns.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: NASA’s DART mission could trigger man-made meteor shower: What you need to know
item.description: Following NASA's DART mission that intentionally impacted asteroid moonlet Dimorphos, over two million pounds of space debris were generated. This debris could result in a faint, man-made meteor shower potentially visible on Earth and Mars over the next 10 to 30 years. The event underscores the importance of studying space debris and planetary defense.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Russia launches missile attack on Kyiv, Ukraine says
item.description: Ukraine's air defense is actively countering a Russian missile attack on Kyiv. Concurrently, Ukraine's drone assault targeted Russian power plants and an oil refinery. In Kharkiv, missile strikes injured 47 people. President Zelenskyy called for global intervention, emphasizing enough courage and resources for Ukraine to defend itself against increasing Russian aggression.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Is Melania secretly rooting for Kamala Harris? Former Trump aide drops a bombshell: 'She hates ...'
item.description: Anthony Scaramucci, former White House communications director, claims Melania Trump might support Kamala Harris more than he does due to her strong dislike for Donald Trump. Scaramucci humorously notes her intense aversion affects her political choices. Meanwhile, Melania remains out of the spotlight, focusing on her memoir, Melania, set for release on October 1, and her family.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Bangladesh HC rejects plea for ban on Awami League
US elections 2024: Muslim-American vote in focus as 'Abandon Harris' campaign intensifies
item.description: The 'Abandon Harris' campaign is intensifying efforts to sway Muslim-American voters against Vice President Kamala Harris in swing states, criticizing her stance on Gaza. Initially aimed at President Biden, the campaign shifted focus to Harris after Biden's exit, urging voters to consider alternatives.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: US elections 2024: Harris edges out Trump - New polls show vice president leading in key battlegrounds
item.description: The 2024 presidential race is highly competitive, with Vice President Kamala Harris narrowly ahead of Donald Trump. Recent polls by ABC News/Ipsos show Harris leading, particularly among women and in key battleground states. Both candidates are ramping up their campaigns as Election Day draws near, aiming to secure their respective bases.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Prince Harry and Meghan Markle's heated argument: Duke snaps at wife, 'Why’s she having a go at me?'
item.description: Prince Harry, in his memoir Spare, shares a raw account of a heated argument with Meghan Markle, triggered by his deeper emotional issues. Emphasizing the importance of therapy and personal growth, he acknowledges Meghan's support in helping him confront his struggles, illustrating the real-life challenges in their relationship.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Grief mixes with anger after recovery of 6 dead hostages
Famed 'Russian spy' whale found dead in Norway; cause a mystery for now
No foul play, Raisi's copter crash due to weather: Iran probe
'Blood on their hands': Trump blasts Biden, Harris over deaths of hostages in Gaza, claims 'this wouldn't have happened under me'
item.description: Donald Trump has blamed Joe Biden and Kamala Harris for the recent deaths of six Hamas hostages, claiming such an outcome would not have occurred under his leadership. Biden and Harris extended their condolences to the victims' families and condemned Hamas for the killings. The hostages were found dead in Gaza after being killed by short-range gunfire.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Ukraine launches mass drone attack on Russia
Trump feels left out as wife Melania and son Barron speak in secret code: 'It annoys him'
item.description: Donald Trump's feeling of exclusion is highlighted as Melania and Barron converse in Slovenian, which Trump doesn't understand. Barron, who speaks multiple languages, stepped into the spotlight at a recent campaign rally. Melania's parents were significantly involved in Barron's upbringing, and Melania’s mother’s death in January 2024 had a profound impact on the family.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: German far-right set to win first state poll since WW2
Bill Ackman slams Biden-Harris on hostage crisis: 'Consider his parents spoke at DNC...'
item.description: Bill Ackman, a hedge fund billionaire, criticized the Biden-Harris administration after six hostages, including one American, were found dead in Gaza. Ackman condemned the US strategy of pressuring Israel for a ceasefire rather than regional allies. Biden expressed outrage and vowed retribution against Hamas, while Harris emphasized the need to eliminate Hamas.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Princess Diana's family wants Harry and William to reconcile: 'If anyone can....'
item.description: As the Spencers are working hard to get the brothers to reconcile, one insider told the Daily Beast both Harry and William adore Princess Diana's elder sister Jane, Robert's widow. They could not decline to attend the funeral out of their respect for Jane and if anyone mediate between the two, it will be Jane.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Tim Walz walks away when asked to comment on dead hostages found in Gaza
item.description: Former president Donald Trump doubled down on the Biden-Harris administration after the hostages were found dead. In a Truth Social post, Trump blamed Kamala Harris and President Joe Biden for the hostage crisis and reiterated that had he been the president, the October 7 attack would have never happened. ​Six bodies were found in Rafah, the southern Gaza hub including that of Hersh Goldberg-Polin who was an American citizen. The Israeli military said the hostages have been brutally murdered by Hamas.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Tim Walz's brother 'sounds like a really great guy' to Donald Trump. Who is Jeff Walz?
item.description: Jeff Walz, elder brother of Democratic VP candidate Tim Walz, has publicly opposed Tim's political stance and is considering endorsing Donald Trump. Jeff, a long-time Republican, said Tim is not the person who should decide America's future. The brothers have not spoken in eight years and Jeff said Tim did not inform him that he was running for the vice president.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Former Clinton official says Elon Musk is out of control: 'He should be threatened'
item.description: Robert Reich, a former US labor secretary, calls for regulating Elon Musk's influence in his Guardian article. He suggests measures like boycotting Tesla and threatening legal action against Musk, citing allegations of foreign interference on X, Musk's platform. Reich's concerns align with Musk expressing interest in a future Trump administration.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk
